introScreen.descriptionContent:
-Match 3 or more bubbles!
-Use the left and right arrow keys to aim. Use up to shoot (desktop).
-Tap the bottom left and right sides of the screen to aim. Tap the top half of the screen to shoot (mobile).
-Longer chains of bubbles give more points.
-Bouncing bubbles off of walls gives double points.

You only have a limited amount of shots, so make them count!
